posts.title: 关于Visual Studio中使用boost出现“LNK1104 无法打开XXX”情况的解决方案
posts.text: 请注意该方法可能仅适用于用NuGet安装的boost 用NuGet安装对应的库即可 例如出现LNK1104 无法打开文件“libboost_system-vc141-mt-gd-x64-1_68.lib” 就直接用NuGet安装boost_system-vc141

posts.title: C++ - 并查集模板
posts.excerpt: Github 洛谷博客 CSDN HOJ博客
posts.text: Github 洛谷博客 CSDN HOJ博客 #include <cstddef> #include <stdexcept> #include <vector> template<bool index_begin_from_zero = false> class Union_Find { private: std::vector<size_t> parent, rank; size_t Find_unchecked(size_t x) { return x == this->parent[x] ? x : this->parent[x] = this->Find_unchecked(this->parent[x]); } public: Union_Find(size_t max_size = static_cast<size_t>(0)) :parent(max_size), rank(max_size, static_cast<size_t>(0)) { try { for (size_t i = static_cast<size_t>(0); i < max_size; ++i) this->parent[i] = i; } catch (std::exception const& e) { throw e; } } Union_Find(const Union_Find& x) :parent(x.parent), rank(x.rank) {} inline Union_Find& operator=(Union_Find x) { this->parent = x.parent; this->rank = x.rank; return *this; } inline size_t size() { return this->parent.size(); } inline void resize(size_t max_size) { *this = Union_Find(max_size); return; } size_t Find(size_t x) { try { size_t res; if (!index_begin_from_zero) { #ifdef DEBUG if (!x) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Find"); #endif --x; } #ifdef DEBUG if (x >= this->size()) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Find"); #endif res = this->Find_unchecked(x); return index_begin_from_zero ? res : ++res; } catch (std::exception const& e) { throw e; } } inline bool Check(size_t x, size_t y) { try { if (!index_begin_from_zero) { #ifdef DEBUG if (!x || !y) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Check"); #endif --x; --y; } #ifdef DEBUG if (x >= this->size() || y >= this->size()) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Check"); #endif return this->Find_unchecked(x) == this->Find_unchecked(y); } catch (std::exception const& e) { throw e; } } inline void Union(size_t x, size_t y) { try { size_t fx, fy; if (!index_begin_from_zero) { #ifdef DEBUG if (!x || !y) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Union"); #endif --x; --y; } #ifdef DEBUG if (x >= this->size() || y >= this->size()) throw std::out_of_range("Union_Find::Union"); #endif fx = this->Find_unchecked(x); fy = this->Find_unchecked(y); if (fx != fy) { if (this->rank[fx] < this->rank[fy]) this->parent[fx] = fy; else { this->parent[fy] = fx; if (this->rank[fx] == this->rank[fy])++this->rank[fx]; } } } catch (std::exception const& e) { throw e; } } };

posts.title: 数学公式与定理收集
posts.excerpt: 本文为本人无聊时收集整理的，内容多来自网络，如有错误请指出。 标题的链接（如果有）指向维基百科对应词条英文版。 温馨提示：部分公式在特殊情况下不成立 手机用户建议横屏浏览。 建议将MathJax的Math Renderer调为SVG。
posts.text: 本文为本人无聊时收集整理的，内容多来自网络，如有错误请指出。 标题的链接（如果有）指向维基百科对应词条英文版。 温馨提示：部分公式在特殊情况下不成立 手机用户建议横屏浏览。 建议将MathJax的Math Renderer调为SVG。 数论威尔逊定理当且仅当$p$为素数时： $$(p-1)!\equiv-1\pmod{p}$$ 欧拉定理若$n,a\in\mathbb{N*}$，且$(n,a)=1$，则： $$a^{\varphi(n)}\equiv1\pmod{n}$$ 孙子定理（中国剩余定理）假设整数$m_1,m_2,\cdots,m_n$两两互质，则对任意的整数：$a_1,a_2,\cdots,a_n$，方程组 $$(S):\space\space\left\{\begin{aligned}x\equiv&\space a_1\pmod{m_1}\\x\equiv&\space a_2\pmod{m_2}\\\vdots\\x\equiv&\space a_n\pmod{m_n}\end{aligned}\right.$$ 有解，并且通解可以用如下方式构造得到： 设$M=m_1\times m2\times\cdots\times m_n$，$M_i=\dfrac{M}{m_i}$，$t_i$为$M_i$模$m_i$意义下的逆元. 方程组$(S)$的通解形式为$x=a_1t_1M_1+a_2t_2M_2+\cdots+a_nt_nM_n+kM$，$k\in\mathbb{Z}$. 在模$M$的意义下，方程组$(S)$只有一个解：$x=(a_1t_1M_1+a_2t_2M_2+\cdots+a_nt_nM_n)\mod M$. 费马小定理如果$p$为质数，而整数$a$不是$p$的倍数，则： $$a^{p-1}\equiv1\pmod{p}$$ Lucas定理$$\dbinom{n}{m}\equiv\dbinom{n\bmod p}{m\bmod p}\times\dbinom{\lfloor\dfrac{n}{p}\rfloor}{\lfloor\dfrac{m}{p}\rfloor}\pmod{p}$$ 代数$\sqrt{a+b\rm i}=\dfrac{\sqrt2}2[\sqrt{\sqrt{a^2+b^2}+a}+(\sqrt{\sqrt{a^2+b^2}-a})\rm i]$ 代数学基本定理任何复系数一元$n(n\ge1)$次多项式方程在复数域上至少有一根. 二项式定理$$(x+y)^n=\sum_{k=0}^n\dbinom n kx^{n-k}y^k=\sum_{k=0}^n\dbinom n kx^ky^{n-k}\space\space(n\in\mathbb N+)$$ 广义二项式定理$$(x+y)^\alpha=\sum_{k=0}^\infty\dbinom\alpha kx^{\alpha-k}y^k\space\space(\alpha\in\mathbb R)$$ 其中$\dbinom\alpha k=\dfrac{\alpha(\alpha-1)\cdots(\alpha-k+1)}{k!}=\dfrac{(\alpha)_k}{k!}$. 一元二次方程求根公式$ax^2+bx+c=0$ $x_{1,2}=\dfrac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac} }{2a}$ 卡丹公式$x^3+px+q=0$ $x_1=\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}+\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }+\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}-\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }$ $x_2=\omega\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}+\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }+\omega^2\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}-\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }$ $x_3=\omega^2\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}+\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }+\omega\sqrt[3]{-\dfrac{q}{2}-\sqrt{(\dfrac{q}{2})^2+(\dfrac{p}{3})^2} }$ 其中$\omega=\dfrac{-1+\sqrt{3}\rm i}{2}$ 一元三次方程求根公式$ax^3+bx^2+cx+d=0$ $u=\dfrac{9abc-27a^2d-2b^3}{54a^3}$ $v=\dfrac{\sqrt{3(4ac^3-b^2c^2-18abcd+27a^2d^2+4b^3d)} }{18a^2}$ 当$|u+v|\ge|u-v|$时$m=\sqrt[3]{u+v}$ 当$|u+v|<|u-v|$时$m=\sqrt[3]{u-v}$ 当$|m|\ne0$时$n=\dfrac{b^2-3ac}{9am}$ 当$|m|=0$时$n=0$ $\omega=\dfrac{-1+\sqrt{3}\rm i}{2}$ $x_1=m+n-\dfrac{b}{3a}$ $x_2=\omega m+\omega^2n-\dfrac{b}{3a}$ $x_3=\omega^2m+\omega n-\dfrac{b}{3a}$ 一元四次方程求根公式$ax^4+bx^3+cx^2+dx+e=0$ $\Delta_1=c^2-3bd+12ae$ $\Delta_2=2c^3-9bcd+27ad^2+27b^2e-72ace$ $\Delta=\dfrac{\sqrt[3]{2}\Delta_1}{3a\sqrt[3]{\Delta_2+\sqrt{-4\Delta_1^3+\Delta_2^2} }}+\dfrac{\sqrt[3]{\Delta_2+\sqrt{-4\Delta_1^3+\Delta_2^2} }}{3\sqrt[3]{2}a}$ $x_1=-\dfrac{b}{4a}-\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta}-\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{2a^2}-\dfrac{4c}{3a}-\Delta-\dfrac{-\dfrac{b^3}{a^3}+\dfrac{4bc}{a^2}-\dfrac{8d}{a} }{4\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta} }}$ $x_2=-\dfrac{b}{4a}-\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta}+\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{2a^2}-\dfrac{4c}{3a}-\Delta-\dfrac{-\dfrac{b^3}{a^3}+\dfrac{4bc}{a^2}-\dfrac{8d}{a} }{4\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta} }}$ $x_3=-\dfrac{b}{4a}+\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta}-\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{2a^2}-\dfrac{4c}{3a}-\Delta+\dfrac{-\dfrac{b^3}{a^3}+\dfrac{4bc}{a^2}-\dfrac{8d}{a} }{4\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta} }}$ $x_4=-\dfrac{b}{4a}+\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta}+\dfrac{1}{2}\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{2a^2}-\dfrac{4c}{3a}-\Delta+\dfrac{-\dfrac{b^3}{a^3}+\dfrac{4bc}{a^2}-\dfrac{8d}{a} }{4\sqrt{\dfrac{b^2}{4a^2}-\dfrac{2c}{3a}+\Delta} }}$ 费马大定理当整数$n>2$时，关于$x,y,z$的方程$x^n+y^n=z^n$没有正整数解. 函数实变函数三角函数常用三角函数$\sin{0^\circ}=0$ $\cos{0^\circ}=1$ $\tan{0^\circ}=0$ $\sin{3^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30}+\sqrt{10}-\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{16}-\dfrac{\sqrt{30}-\sqrt{10}+\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{32}\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }$ $\cos{3^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30}-\sqrt{10}-\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{16}+\dfrac{\sqrt{30}+\sqrt{10}+\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{32}\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }$ $\tan{3^\circ}=2+\sqrt{5}+\sqrt{15+6\sqrt{5} }-\dfrac{3\sqrt{3}+\sqrt{15}+\sqrt{5+2\sqrt{5} }+\sqrt{25+10\sqrt{5} }}{2}$ $\sin{6^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30-6\sqrt{5} }-1-\sqrt{5} }{8}$ $\cos{6^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{15}+\sqrt{3}+\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }}{8}$ $\tan{6^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{3}-\sqrt{15}+\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }}{2}$ $\sin{15^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{4}$ $\cos{15^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{4}$ $\tan{15^\circ}=2-\sqrt{3}$ $\sin{18^\circ}=\dfrac{-1+\sqrt{5} }{4}$ $\cos{18^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{10+2\sqrt{5} }}{4}$ $\tan{18^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{25-10\sqrt{5} }}{5}$ $\sin{22.5^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2} }}{2}$ $\cos{22.5^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2+\sqrt{2} }}{2}$ $\tan{22.5^\circ}=\sqrt{2}-1$ $\sin{30^\circ}=\dfrac{1}{2}$ $\cos{30^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{3} }{2}$ $\tan{30^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{3} }{3}$ $\sin{36^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }}{4}$ $\cos{36^\circ}=\dfrac{1+\sqrt{5} }{4}$ $\tan{36^\circ}=\sqrt{5-2\sqrt{5} }$ $\sin{37.5^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{8-2\sqrt{6}+2\sqrt{2} }}{4}$ $\cos{37.5^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{8+2\sqrt{6}-2\sqrt{2} }}{4}$ $\tan{37.5^\circ}=\sqrt{15-6\sqrt{6}-8\sqrt{3}+10\sqrt{2} }$ $\sin{45^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2} }{2}$ $\cos{45^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2} }{2}$ $\tan{45^\circ}=1$ $\sin{54^\circ}=\dfrac{1+\sqrt{5} }{4}$ $\cos{54^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }}{4}$ $\tan{54^\circ}=\sqrt{5-2\sqrt{5} }+\dfrac{2\sqrt{25-10\sqrt{5} }}{5}$ $\sin{60^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{3} }{2}$ $\cos{60^\circ}=\dfrac{1}{2}$ $\tan{60^\circ}=\sqrt{3}$ $\sin{72^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{10+2\sqrt{5} }}{4}$ $\cos{72^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{5}-1}{4}$ $\tan{72^\circ}=\sqrt{5+2\sqrt{5} }$ $\sin{75^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{4}$ $\cos{75^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{4}$ $\tan{75^\circ}=2+\sqrt{3}$ $\sin{84^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{15}+\sqrt{3}+\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }}{8}$ $\cos{84^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30-6\sqrt{5} }-1-\sqrt{5} }{8}$ $\sin{87^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30}-\sqrt{10}-\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{16}+\dfrac{\sqrt{30}+\sqrt{10}+\sqrt{6}+\sqrt{2} }{32}\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }$ $\cos{87^\circ}=\dfrac{\sqrt{30}+\sqrt{10}-\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{16}-\dfrac{\sqrt{30}-\sqrt{10}+\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2} }{32}\sqrt{10-2\sqrt{5} }$ $\sin{90^\circ}=1$ $\cos{90^\circ}=0$ 基本关系$\sin^2{x}+\cos^2{x}=1$ $\dfrac{\sin{x} }{\cos{x} }=\tan{x}$ 和/差角公式$\sin{(\alpha+\beta)}=\sin{\alpha}\cos{\beta}+\cos{\alpha}\sin{\beta}$ $\sin{(\alpha-\beta)}=\sin{\alpha}\cos{\beta}-\cos{\alpha}\sin{\beta}$ $\cos{(\alpha+\beta)}=\cos{\alpha}\cos{\beta}-\sin{\alpha}\sin{\beta}$ $\cos{(\alpha-\beta)}=\cos{\alpha}\cos{\beta}+\sin{\alpha}\sin{\beta}$ $\tan{(\alpha+\beta)}=\dfrac{\tan{\alpha}+\tan{\beta} }{1-\tan{\alpha}\tan{\beta} }$ $\tan{(\alpha-\beta)}=\dfrac{\tan{\alpha}-\tan{\beta} }{1+\tan{\alpha}\tan{\beta} }$ 倍角公式半倍角公式$\sin{\dfrac{\alpha}{2} }=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1-\cos{\alpha} }{2} }$ $\cos{\dfrac{\alpha}{2} }=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1+\cos{\alpha} }{2} }$ $\tan{\dfrac{\alpha}{2} }=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1-\cos{\alpha} }{1+\cos{\alpha} }}=\dfrac{\sin{\alpha} }{1+\cos{\alpha} }=\dfrac{1-\cos{\alpha} }{\sin{\alpha} }$ 二倍角公式$\sin{2\alpha}=2\sin{\alpha}\cos{\alpha}$ $\cos{2\alpha}=\cos^2{\alpha}-\sin^2{\alpha}=2\cos^2{\alpha}-1=1-2\sin^2{\alpha}$ $\tan{2\alpha}=\dfrac{2\tan{\alpha} }{1-\tan^2{\alpha} }$ 三倍角公式$\sin{3\alpha}=3\sin{\alpha}-4\sin^3{\alpha}=4\sin{\alpha}\sin{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}+\alpha)\sin{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}-\alpha})}$ $\cos{3\alpha}=4\cos^3{\alpha}-3\cos{\alpha}=4\cos{\alpha}\cos{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}+\alpha)}\cos{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}-\alpha)}$ $\tan{3\alpha}=\dfrac{\tan^3{\alpha}-3\tan{\alpha} }{3\tan^2{\alpha}-1}=\tan{\alpha}\tan{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}+\alpha)}\tan{(\dfrac{\pi}{3}-\alpha)}$ 辅助角公式$$a\sin{x}+b\cos{x}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2}\sin{(x+\arctan{\dfrac{b}{a}})},a>0$$ $$a\sin{x}+b\cos{x}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2}\cos{(x-\arctan{\dfrac{a}{b}})},a>0$$ 和差化积公式$\sin{\alpha}+\sin{\beta}=2\sin{\dfrac{\alpha+\beta}{2} }\cos{\dfrac{\alpha-\beta}{2} }$ $\sin{\alpha}-\sin{\beta}=2\cos{\dfrac{\alpha+\beta}{2} }\sin{\dfrac{\alpha-\beta}{2} }$ $\cos{\alpha}+\cos{\beta}=2\cos{\dfrac{\alpha+\beta}{2} }\cos{\dfrac{\alpha-\beta}{2} }$ $\cos{\alpha}-\cos{\beta}=-2\sin{\dfrac{\alpha+\beta}{2} }\sin{\dfrac{\alpha-\beta}{2} }$ $\tan{\alpha}+\tan{\beta}=\dfrac{\sin{(\alpha+\beta)} }{\cos{\alpha}\cos{\beta} }$ $\tan{\alpha}-\tan{\beta}=\dfrac{\sin{(\alpha-\beta)} }{\cos{\alpha}\cos{\beta} }$ 积化和差公式$\sin{\alpha}\cos{\beta}=\dfrac{1}{2}[\sin{(\alpha+\beta)}+\sin{(\alpha-\beta)}]$ $\cos{\alpha}\sin{\beta}=\dfrac{1}{2}[\sin{(\alpha+\beta)}-\sin{(\alpha-\beta)}]$ $\cos{\alpha}\cos{\beta}=\dfrac{1}{2}[\cos{(\alpha+\beta)}+\cos{(\alpha-\beta)}]$ $\sin{\alpha}\sin{\beta}=-\dfrac{1}{2}[\cos{(\alpha+\beta)}-\cos{(\alpha-\beta)}]$ 万能公式$\sin{\alpha}=\dfrac{2\tan{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}{1+\tan^2{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}$ $\cos{\alpha}=\dfrac{1-\tan^2{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}{1+\tan^2{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}$ $\tan{\alpha}=\dfrac{2\tan{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}{1-\tan^2{\dfrac{\alpha}{2}}}$ 复变函数$\sin{(a+b{\rm i})}=\sin{a}\cosh{b}+{\rm i}\cos{a}\sinh{b}$ 欧拉公式${\rm e}^{ {\rm i}x}=\cos{x}+{\rm i}\sin{x}$ ${\rm e}^{\rm i\pi}+1=0$ 数学分析微积分洛必达法则（L’Hôpital’s rule）对于在点$c$的某去心邻域$I$内可导的函数$f(x)$和$g(x)$，若$\lim\limits_{x\to c}{f(x)}=\lim\limits_{x\to c}{g(x)}=0$或$\pm\infty$且$\forall x\in{I},g’(x)\ne0$且$\lim\limits_{x\to c}{\dfrac{f’(x)}{g’(x)}}$存在，则 $\lim\limits_{x\to c}{\dfrac{f(x)}{g(x)}}=\lim\limits_{x\to c}{\dfrac{f'(x)}{g'(x)}}$. 计算${\rm e}^x=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\dfrac{x^n}{n!} },x\in\mathbb{C}$ $\ln{(1+x)}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\dfrac{ {(-1)}^nx^{n+1} }{n+1} },x\in(-1,1]$ $\sin{x}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\dfrac{(-1)^{n}x^{2n+1} }{(2n+1)!} },x\in\mathbb{R}$ $\cos{x}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\dfrac{(-1)^nx^{2n} }{(2n)!} },x\in\mathbb{R}$ $\tan{x}=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\dfrac{ {(-1)}^{n-1}2^{2n}(2^{2n}-1)B_{2n}x^{2n-1} }{(2n)!} },x\in(-\dfrac\pi2,\dfrac\pi2)$ $\arcsin{x}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\dfrac{(2n-1)!!x^{2n+1} }{(2n)!!(2n+1)} },x\in(-1,1)$ 更新中……
